alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:24AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following bayou in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Webster, Bossier and Bienville Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn Louisiana. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...minor low lying flooding of the boat ramp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to 17.0 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 14 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 930 AM CDT.
